events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but now I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I'd like a refund.
The system has categorized the issue as related to refund and return request after review of customer messages.
An agent specialized in returns and refunds has been assigned to handle this customer case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has the original tags and packaging?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and has all original tags and packaging intact.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund process. Please pack the jacket securely and send it back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to receiving the refund once you get the jacket back.
The refund process has been officially started and you will be notified once the return package is received and approved.
Just checking in to confirm that your return has been received and your refund has been processed successfully. Let us know if you need any more help.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us and please feel free to reach out if you have any other questions.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. We would appreciate your feedback about your recent refund experience.
